landing-page_heading_primary: Make learning fun and effective with custom flashcards!
landing-page_carousel_item_1_text_1: Make learning more efficient with personalized flashcards.
landing-page_carousel_item_1_text_2: Choose from different types of cards to create decks tailored to your needs.
landing-page_carousel_item_1_text_3: Organize your decks by topic, class, or whatever you need.
landing-page_carousel_item_1_text_4: Easily edit, add or remove cards as your learning progresses.
landing-page_carousel_item_2_text_1: Strengthen your memory by playing interactive games with your flashcards.
landing-page_carousel_item_2_text_2: Choose from different types of games to keep things fresh and exciting.
landing-page_carousel_item_2_text_3: Our games are designed to be both fun and effective for learning.
landing-page_carousel_item_2_text_4: Track your progress and improve your scores as you play.
landing-page_carousel_item_3_text_1: Track your learning progress and see how well you're retaining information.
landing-page_carousel_item_3_text_2: Color-coded flashcards show you which items you've mastered and which ones you need to review.
landing-page_carousel_item_3_text_3: Our progress tracker lets you see how much you've improved over time.
landing-page_carousel_item_3_text_4: Get motivated by watching your progress grow as you play.
register_header: Sign up for a new account
